page.title: 19Rumwell Community
page.content: Rumwell is a small community just off the busy A38 road from Taunton to Wellington. It has a public house, twenty-three houses and a population of between seventy and one hundred. A number of its inhabitants were interviewed and the following comments were made: "We like living here, but it is not easy to get about, we would like more public transport." "It's a nice village but rather small and it's a pity there are no shops." "It's very quiet here but sometimes the local farmer puts on a barn dance" "The roads are pitch black at night, we could do with some street lights." "Sometimes the Morris Dancers come to dance outside the Rumwell Inn." "I wish the local farmer would take more care; his tractors spread muck all over the road. It's dangerous."
